snippet: The Carlyle Group has lowered the range for its initial public offering to $22 to $23 a unit as the private equity firm and its advisers prepare to price the stock sale later in the day.
abstract: The Carlyle Group has lowered the range for its initial public offering to $22 to $23 a unit as the private equity firm and its advisers prepare to price the stock sale later in the day.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Lowers I.P.O. Range on Eve of Pricing
